message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this split makes sense.
Alice, my turn to propose what I think is fair.  Let's wrap this up and not lose any money to inflation!
Okay Bob, let's stop wasting time. 50/50 seems like the fairest deal. Take it or leave it.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'll keep offering what's fair.  Take it before we both lose even more!
Bob, it's clear you're not interested in fairness.  I'm willing to compromise slightly, but this is my final offer.
